citeinfo.origin: Fisheries and Oceans Canada, Science Branch - Data Analyst
citeinfo.title: Groundfish Catch and Effort Database (Canada)

descript.abstract:
Parameter Groundfish catch and effort data for trawl, sablefish trap and longline gear types
The catch and effort data were obtained from daily logbooks filled out by fishers. Information recorded and stored in the database include area and depth of capture, amount of effort expended, species caught and amounts. Includes trawl, sablefish trap and longline fisheries
Geographic Area Pacific coast of Canada
Publication Annual Reports, CDFO Technical Reports
Other Comments "Trawl catch and effort data is available from 1954-1995. Information for trap is available from 1979-1995 and longline information is available from 1979-1985. Collection of catch and effort data is continuing but data will be housed in a new relational database that is in its final phases of development. Throughout the years the GFCATCH database has evolved and most changes have only been documented internally. Please contact the custodian for more details on the database."
[ A TCODE project ]

distinfo.distliab: While every effort has been made to ensure that these data are accurate and reliable within the limits of the current state of the art, NOAA cannot assume liability for any damages caused by any errors or omissions in the data, nor as a result of the failure of the data to function on a particular system. NOAA makes no warranty, expressed or implied, nor does the fact of distribution constitute such a warranty.
